sentences.en: Can you take a look at my pager?
sentences.cn: 你能看一下我的传呼机 吗 ?

sentences.en: Did you give Roz the phone and pager numbers?
sentences.cn: 你把电话和寻呼号码给罗丝了 吗 ?

sentences.en: Did your pager really just go off, or are you ditching the conversation?
sentences.cn: 你的寻呼机真的响了还是你想中断谈话?

sentences.en: Do you use any of the following? Pager, Answering machine, Mobile phone, Car phone.
sentences.cn: 你使用下面的物品吗？传呼机、电话答录机、移动电话和车载电话。

sentences.en: Don't worry about it. I have his pager number right here.
sentences.cn: 别担心. 我这儿有他的呼机号.

sentences.en: Each pager alarm message ends on ticker item cancellation.
sentences.cn: 每个传呼机报警讯息结束对股票项目取消.

sentences.en: For example, the domain of a basic pager is information access.
sentences.cn: 例如, 基本类型的寻呼机的应用领域是信息接入.

sentences.en: I don't know your pager number.
sentences.cn: 我不知道你的寻呼号码.

sentences.en: May I have the number of your pager or cellular phone?
sentences.cn: 我可以有你的呼叫器或大哥大号码 吗 ?

sentences.en: Messages you type here are delivered to a mobile phone or pager.
sentences.cn: 在此窗口中键入的消息将发送至移动电话或呼机.

sentences.en: Pls switch off pager and mobile phone during the show.
sentences.cn: 避免干扰他人,影片放映期间,请关掉传呼及手提电话.

sentences.en: Scores of messages on his pager have not been answered.
sentences.cn: 他寻呼机上的许多信息都还没有回复。

sentences.en: The pager is cheap but only handles minimal amounts of information.
sentences.cn: 传呼机便宜但只能处置少量的信息.

sentences.en: The pager my father used to have had a Chinese display.
sentences.cn: 爸爸原来用的传呼机是汉显的.

sentences.en: This pager works well , but that one does not ( work well ).
sentences.cn: 这个寻呼机工作正常, 但那个就不行.

sentences.en: You mean by the coming more than the pager company.
sentences.cn: 你的意思是说你们公司将不止经营寻呼机业务,要成为多种经营的企业.

words.tran_cn: 用传呼机传呼（page的现在分词形式）

trans.tran_en: a small machine you can carry in your pocket that can receive signals from a telephone. It tells you when someone has sent you a message, or wants you to telephone them, for example by making a noise.
